thread.title: Model boss back in dock
thread.title_full: Model boss back in dock | News24

author: news24.com
title: Model boss back in dock
text:
Johannesburg - Modelling company owner Dawie de Villiers will return to the dock at the High Court sitting at Palm Ridge on Monday.
The founder and owner of Modelling South Africa faces 38 counts of rape, sexual assault, indecent assault, sexual grooming, possession and accessing of child pornography as well as fraud and theft.
He is alleged to have raped and sexually violated several teenage girls between 2011 and 2012.
The Kempton Park businessman is accused of among others, raping a 15-year-old girl in 2011. He then allegedly asked the teenager to have a relationship with him and to send him a picture of her private parts.
